meanings.definition: A group of compounds that are part of the vitamin B6 group.
meanings.sent1: Pyridoxins are important for our body's health.
meanings.sent2: I take pyridoxins to ensure I get enough vitamin B6.
meanings.sent3: The pyridoxins had a party in my body, making me feel energetic!
meanings.sent4: Her bloodstream was a bustling city, with pyridoxins as the diligent workers.
meanings.sent5: The pyridoxins were like tiny superheroes, fighting off fatigue and keeping me strong.

meanings.definition: A type of vitamin that is essential for human health.
meanings.sent1: Make sure you include pyridoxins in your diet for overall wellness.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend getting enough pyridoxins through food or supplements.
meanings.sent3: The pyridoxins in my breakfast cereal were doing a happy dance.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the benefits of pyridoxins on her health.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the power of pyridoxins coursing through my veins, keeping me strong.
